epics.title: User Authentication
epics.summary: Implement secure login and multi-factor authentication
epics.description: Develop a secure login system using React and FastAPI with multi-factor authentication (MFA) capabilities. Ensure users can authenticate via a combination of passwords and one-time codes sent via email or SMS. Sensitive data must be encrypted for security.

epics.title: User Profile Management
epics.summary: Create and manage user profiles with role-based access
epics.description: Design and implement user profile management in React and FastAPI, allowing users to create, view, and modify their profiles. Integrate role-based access controls to ensure users can only access data and functionalities appropriate to their authorization level.

epics.title: Personalized Dashboard
epics.summary: Display personalized banking products and services
epics.description: Develop a personalized dashboard using React to present users with relevant banking products and services based on their profile and eligibility. Integrate with FastAPI for backend processing and PostgreSQL for storing user-specific data.

epics.title: Responsive Design
epics.summary: Ensure portal is responsive across desktops, tablets, and mobiles
epics.description: Implement responsive design principles in React to ensure the self-service portal provides a consistent user experience across various devices, including desktops, tablets, and mobile phones.

epics.title: History of Interactions
epics.summary: Maintain comprehensive history of user interactions
epics.description: Develop functionalities within React and FastAPI to maintain a comprehensive history of all user interactions. Ensure interaction data is securely stored in PostgreSQL and can be retrieved and displayed on demand.

epics.title: Account Opening Requests
epics.description: Design and implement workflows using React and FastAPI to allow users to submit account opening requests efficiently. Ensure minimal clicks are required to complete the process and allow users to save incomplete applications and return to them later.

epics.title: Service Modifications
epics.summary: Allow users to submit service modification requests
epics.description: Create streamlined workflows in React and FastAPI for users to submit requests for modifying existing services. Ensure the workflow is user-friendly and requires minimal clicks, with the ability to upload necessary documentation directly through the interface.

epics.title: Real-time Status Updates
epics.summary: Provide real-time updates on request statuses
epics.description: Implement real-time status update functionalities in React and FastAPI to keep users informed about the status of their submitted requests. Leverage websockets or polling mechanisms to ensure timely updates.

epics.title: Email Notifications
epics.summary: Send email notifications regarding submitted requests
epics.description: Integrate email notification functionalities within FastAPI to inform users about the status changes of their submitted requests. Ensure the email content is clear and informative.

epics.title: Role-based Access Control
epics.summary: Implement RBAC to control access based on user profile
epics.description: Develop role-based access controls (RBAC) within React and FastAPI to restrict access to functionalities based on user profiles and authorization levels. Ensure secure data handling and permissions enforcement.

epics.title: Core Banking System Integration
epics.summary: Integrate portal with existing core banking system
epics.description: Develop integration points within FastAPI to seamlessly connect the self-service portal with the bank's existing core banking system. Ensure data synchronization and reliability without compromising performance.

epics.title: Seamless Documentation Upload
epics.summary: Allow users to upload necessary documentation effortlessly
epics.description: Implement functionalities in React and FastAPI to enable users to upload necessary documentation during workflows. Ensure the upload process is intuitive and secure.

epics.title: Optimize Performance and Reliability
epics.summary: Enhance system performance and ensure reliability
epics.description: Optimize the self-service portal's performance and reliability using techniques like caching, efficient data querying, and asynchronous processing in FastAPI. Ensure responsiveness and minimal downtime.
